author: sandygao
msg: Allow both --MM-- and --MM as valid gMonth representations.
We'll remove the support for --MM-- when the erratum is officially in the rec.

author: elena
msg: Applied patch from Philippe Le Hegaret: NPE parsing entity with no value.

author: neilg
msg: for external subset preparsing, set an XMLErrorReporter on the EntityManager so that
it can create a locale-sensitive reader.  Also, eliminate a spurious, synthetic endDTD call.

author: elena
msg: emptyElement should not call handleEndElement if validator is removed from the

author: neilg
msg: "fix" for bug 11571.  The bug report was wrong, but this fixes an NPE that it provoked.
Also, identity constraints now properly handle cases where an identity constraint is
defined on a recursive element.  I have also reworked some code to save
